verses.name: Acts 18:20
verses.text: When they desired him to tarry longer time with them, he consented not;

verses.name: Acts 18:21
verses.text: But bade them farewell, saying, I must by all means keep this feast that cometh in Jerusalem: but I will return again unto you, if God will. And he sailed from Ephesus.

verses.name: Acts 18:22
verses.text: And when he had landed at Cesarea, and gone up, and saluted the church, he went down to Antioch.

verses.name: Acts 18:23
verses.text: And after he had spent some time there, he departed, and went over all the country of Galatia and Phrygia in order, strengthening all the disciples.
